name: Bouncy Capsule Deluxe 3D
description:
Bouncy Capsule Deluxe 3D

by Sebastian Lane

For each of the 3 levels platform your way to the blue rectangle finish line. Collect as many coins as you can and avoid the tyranny of the headcrabs or jump on their heads!

Note: If you are good at platformer games you might find this easy, but if you aren't this could be quite a challenge. Let me know what you thought of the game!

Credits

  • Coding
    • Most of the code was created by following this awesome tutorial, Build Your First 3D Game in Unity | Unity Beginner Tutorial by Coding In Flow.
      • Check out Coding In Flow's YouTube channel. 
    • Remaining code created by Sebastian Lane
  • Level Design
    • Coins created following the Coding In Flow tutorial mentioned above.
    • Remaining level design by Sebastian Lane
  • Music: Free Music Tracks For Games by Rizwan Ashraf
  • Sound effects: Free Casual Game SFX Pack by Dustyroom
